input: Beginning: Steve and some neighbor kids decided to race bikes. Middle 1: The kids were hesitant to play tricks on other neighbors. Middle 2: The kids decided to play tricks on other neighbors. Ending: The kids ran away after they rang the doorbell.

input: Beginning: Juanita woke up early for a canoe ride on the lake. Middle 1: She fell out of the boat!. Middle 2: She fell out of the bed!. Ending: Juanita climbed back into the boat.
